summary: "Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides" is a 2011 adventure movie. It's the fourth part of the Pirates series and follows Captain Jack Sparrow, played by Johnny Depp. Jack goes on a journey to find the Fountain of Youth. He meets Angelica, a woman from his past, and joins forces with his rival, Captain Barbossa. They face zombies, mermaids, and the Spanish Armada. The film was expensive to make but did very well at the box office. It was directed by Rob Marshall and had a fun, action-packed story.
title: Pirates of the Caribbean On Stranger Tides
